org.mini2Dx.core.font

Interface GameFont

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitmapFont, MonospaceFont

    public interface GameFont

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        void draw(Graphics g,
          java.lang.String str,
          float x,
          float y)
        Draws text to the Graphics context using this font
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context
        str - The text to render
        x - The x coordinate to draw at
        y - The y coordinate to draw at

      • draw

        void draw(Graphics g,
          java.lang.String str,
          float x,
          float y,
          float targetWidth)
        Draws text to the Graphics context using this font
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context
        str - The text to render
        x - The x coordinate to draw at
        y - The y coordinate to draw at
        targetWidth - The target width to render with (Note: text will wrap if exceeding this width)

      • draw

        void draw(Graphics g,
          java.lang.String str,
          float x,
          float y,
          float targetWidth,
          int horizontalAlignment,
          boolean wrap)
        Draws text to the Graphics context using this font
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics context
        str - The text to render
        x - The x coordinate to draw at
        y - The y coordinate to draw at
        targetWidth - The target width to render with
        horizontalAlignment - The horizontal alignment within the targetWidth. See Align
        wrap - True if text should wrap if exceeding targetWidth, false if it should clip

      • newGlyphLayout

        FontGlyphLayout newGlyphLayout()
        Creates a FontGlyphLayout for this font
        Returns:
        A new FontGlyphLayout instance

      • getSharedGlyphLayout

        FontGlyphLayout getSharedGlyphLayout()
        Returns a FontGlyphLayout instance associated with this GameFont instance
        Returns:
        A FontGlyphLayout instance attached to this font

      • newCache

        GameFontCache newCache()
        Creates a GameFontCache for this font
        Returns:
        A new GameFontCache instance

      • getColor

        com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color getColor()
        Returns the Color the font will be rendered with
        Returns:
        Color.BLACK by default

      • useIntegerPositions

        boolean useIntegerPositions()
        Returns if characters use integer positions
        Returns:
        False if characters can be placed on half-pixels

        Disposes of this font instance and its resources
